› give exac time with seconds


• Ran date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S %Z'
  └ 2025-10-19 14:02:00 +08

─ Worked for 14s ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────

• Current time: 2025-10-19 14:02:00 +08
